'''Drunkard Gorge''' is a stretch of road separating [[Dawn Winery]] and [[Wolvendom]].

It used to be a popular location for merchants; however, it is now considered dangerous, and most people have left.<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Farrah}}</ref>
